display_information.name: Selah
display_information.description: Restorative Pathways AI practitioner — pause and reflect.
display_information.long_description: Selah (Hebrew: pause and reflect) is an AI practitioner for Restorative Pathways. It supports restoration-oriented sessions via direct message: domain sweep, pathway identification, and discernment-led restoration. The bot receives DMs only and responds in the posture of a practitioner who holds the subject and topic in awareness, follows the framework catalog, and respects consent and readiness. Not for diagnosis, fixing, or optimization — for creating conditions in which restoration can occur safely.
